com.csvcomparator.main

Class Arguments

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.csvcomparator.main.Arguments

  • public class Arguments
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to read the arguments provided to the application, storing them and provided them globally. The arguments are used in the whole application for different purposes. Also the argument "-column.compareDef" is used to choose some methods, which should be invoked.

    Please find the documentation for the arguments and methods in the file "CSVComparator_Documentation.docx".

    Available arguments
    ===============================================
    -older.label={label}
    -younger.label={label}

    -config.file={filepath}
    -older.file={filepath}
    -younger.file={filepath}
    -result.file={filepath}

    -older.delimiter={delimiter}
    -younger.delimiter={delimiter}
    -result.delimiter={delimiter}

    -result.comparediff={true|false}
    -result.comparediff%={true|false}
    -result.comparestring={true|false}

    -result.sort={true|false}

    -config.loglevel.console={true|false}

    -column.identifier={olderColumnHeader},{youngerColumnHeader}
    -column.identifier.makeunique={true|false}

    -column.toplevel={olderColumnHeader},{youngerColumnHeader},{Value}

    ##### TODO -hierarchy={Value},{Value},{Value}...
    ##### TODO -hierarchyColumn={olderColumnHeader},{youngerColumnHeader}

    -column.compareDef={olderColumnHeader},{youngerColumnHeader},{method},{method},...

    Available Methods for -column.compareDef
    ===============================================
    -printOlder()
    -printYounger()
    -printMerged()
    -printSeparator()

    -compareDifference%()
    -compareDifference()
    -compareAsStrings()

    -divideYoungerBy()
    -multiplyYoungerBy()
    -divideOlderBy()
    -multiplyOlderBy()

    Author:
    Reto Scheiwiller, 2014

    • Method Detail

      • loadDefaultSettings

        public void loadDefaultSettings()
        Loads the default Settings of the Arguements, removes -column.identifier and all -column.compareDef definitions.

      • readArguments

        public void readArguments(java.lang.String[] args)
        Parses the command line Arguments. First check if a config file is provided and override all other command line arguments if it is found.
        Parameters:
        args - the arguments to parse.

      • printArguments

        public void printArguments()
        Print a list of readed arguments to standard output. Will be executed if debug is enabled.

      • printColumnDefinitions

        public void printColumnDefinitions()
        Print a list of readed column definitions to standard output. Will be executed if debug is enabled.

      • hasColumnDefinitions

        public boolean hasColumnDefinitions()
        Check if column definitions are defined.
        Returns:
        true if at least one column definition is present

      • isDebugEnabled

        public boolean isDebugEnabled()
        Check if debug is enabled
        Returns:
        true if debug is enabled.
